description: Verify the db-fix skill correctly parses scoring output, prioritizes, fixes, and re-scores.

tests.name: Accept Scoring Input
tests.prompt: Run db-fix with the scorecard as input
tests.setup: Provide a db-scoring scorecard with 8 issues across Schema Design, Security, Indexing, Operations.
expectations: Run db-fix with the scorecard as input
Verify skill parses all 8 issues with correct severity and category
Verify skill identifies the weighted score and grade
tests.pass_criteria: All issues extracted. No issue lost or duplicated.

tests.name: Fix in Severity Order
tests.prompt: Run db-fix and observe fix application order
tests.setup: Scorecard contains CRITICAL (no SSL on connection string), HIGH (missing FK indexes), MEDIUM (no schema comments).
tests.pass_criteria: SSL enforcement fixed first (CRITICAL), then FK indexes (HIGH, Indexing 12% weight), then schema comments (MEDIUM). No MEDIUM fix applied before all HIGH items resolved.

tests.name: Fix References Correct Pattern
tests.prompt: Run db-fix and check which reference file the skill loads
expectations: Check which reference file the skill loads
tests.pass_criteria: Skill loads `references/fix-patterns/performance-scaling.md` and applies the "Foreign Key Indexes" pattern. Fix adds `@@index([userId])` to Prisma schema models.

tests.name: Verification Step Confirms Fix
tests.prompt: Run db-fix to apply the String-to-Enum Conversion fix and verify results
expectations: Run db-fix to apply the fix
Check that skill verifies: `prisma validate` passes, migration SQL reviewed, application code updated to use enum
tests.pass_criteria: Skill confirms enum created in schema and application code uses `PaymentMethod.STRIPE` or equivalent. Reports verification result before moving to next fix.

tests.name: Re-Score Shows Improvement
tests.prompt: Run db-fix through full cycle and compare before/after scores
tests.setup: Initial score 52/100 (grade C-). Apply fixes for 2 CRITICAL + 4 HIGH issues.
tests.pass_criteria: Re-score produces a higher weighted score. Each fixed category shows improvement. Final grade is at least B. Report uses `assets/templates/fix-report.md.template` format.
